meaningMnemonic: You have <kanji>remainder</kanji> <kanji>thoughts</kanji> when your hear about something <vocabulary>unfortunate</vocabulary>. That's <vocabulary>too bad</vocabulary>, you think, I wish it could have been different. Those remainder thoughts are a kind of regret, right? That's why this can mean <vocabulary>regrettable</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>disappointing</vocabulary> too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
